title: Homecoming Fight
subtitle: The Raw One Returns to Oakland
description: Kumar 'The Raw One' Prescod returns to his hometown of Oakland for a special homecoming fight. After starting his professional career with three straight knockouts, Kumar brings his explosive style back to the Bay Area for what promises to be an electric night of boxing.
highlights: Kumar's first professional fight in Oakland
Homecoming celebration for the Bay Area's rising star
Special meet & greet for VIP ticket holders
Youth boxing clinic on fight week

specialEvents.name: Youth Boxing Clinic
specialEvents.description: Kumar gives back to the community with a free youth boxing clinic

specialEvents.name: VIP Meet & Greet
specialEvents.description: Exclusive meet and greet for VIP ticket holders
